description: Create harness folder tools/workflow-harness with documented CLI entrypoint
Implement CLI argument parsing: --test, --base-url, --tenant, --cookie/--cookie-file, --force, --timeout-ms
Implement test discovery by folder path (validate required files exist)
Define test runtime context object passed into test.cjs
Provide HTTP helper that automatically sets Cookie + x-tenant-id
Provide Postgres read helper (required; configurable host/port/password) for assertions
Integrate workflow import via existing workflow bundle import API (supports force overwrite)
Add workflow export helper (for debug artifacts and optional assertions)
Implement waitForRun helper (poll workflow_runs for imported workflow after trigger time)
Implement helper to fetch workflow_run_steps and summarize step statuses
Standardize pass/fail output format and exit codes
Write failure artifacts (run details, steps, errors, server/worker log snippets)
Add fixture root ee/test-data/workflow-harness with README and conventions
Add a golden path fixture: ticket-created-hello (import → create ticket → assert run SUCCEEDED)
Support deterministic fixture workflow keys (fixture.<name>) and always import with --force in docs
Provide harness assertion utilities (expect helpers, structured errors, timeout handling)
Add harness option to run in debug/verbose mode
Add harness option to print a JSON result blob for programmatic consumption
Create a fixture scaffolding helper script (generate folder with template bundle.json + test.cjs)
Define fixture categories and naming scheme (trigger domain + behavior + assertion type)
Add cleanup hooks (ctx.onCleanup) and run cleanup after each test (pass or fail)
Create ticket-trigger fixture set (coverage across ticket-related steps and validations)
Create project-trigger fixture set (coverage across project actions/validations)
Create billing-trigger fixture set (invoice/payment/contract events)
Create email-trigger fixture set (inbound/outbound email events)
Create scheduling-trigger fixture set (appointments/schedule blocks)
Create integration-trigger fixture set (webhooks/sync events) where supported
Create node-type coverage fixtures (state.set, transform.assign, control.if, control.tryCatch, control.return, etc.)
Create schema-validation fixtures (missing schema, unknown schema, mismatch requires mapping)
Create runtime-behavior fixtures (pause/visibility, concurrency limits) where supported
Create negative fixtures (expected failure modes with clear errors) where supported
Scale fixture suite to ~150–200 cases with broad coverage
